processGroups.comments: When first connected to a database, this process group will fetch all person ids in batches.

labels.label: Split the batch of Ids into groups of 50
Execute the provided SELECT statement to fetch a batch of Ids
Update the Id attribute to remove the [ and ]
Pull the Id's into an attribute

Generates a series of SELECT statements to get batches of person_uid's
Example: SELECT person_parent_uid FROM person WHERE person_parent_uid <= 263758719 AND person_parent_uid >= 9025000 AND person_parent_uid < 9035000

processGroups.name: Person Initial Load

labels.label: Monitors the person_name table for any changes newer than the initial state. Initial state will be set to the most recent record when NiFi is first started

entry.value: SELECT p.person_parent_uid person_uid, person_name.last_chg_time FROM person_name WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN person p WITH (NOLOCK) ON person_name.person_uid = p.person_uid

labels.label: Monitors the person_race table for any changes newer than the initial state. Initial state will be set to the most recent record when NiFi is first started

entry.value: SELECT p.person_parent_uid person_uid, person_race.last_chg_time FROM person_race WITH(NOLOCK) join person p WITH(NOLOCK) ON p.person_uid = person_race.person_uid

labels.label: Monitors the entity_locator_participation table for any changes newer than the initial state. Initial state will be set to the most recent record when NiFi is first started

entry.value:
SELECT p.person_parent_uid person_uid, elp.last_chg_time
FROM Entity_locator_participation elp WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN person p WITH(NOLOCK) ON p.person_uid = elp.entity_uid

labels.label: Monitors the person table for any changes newer than the initial state. Initial state will be set to the most recent record when NiFi is first started
Monitors the entity_id table for any changes newer than the initial state. Initial state will be set to the most recent record when NiFi is first started

entry.value: SELECT person_parent_uid person_uid, eid.last_chg_time FROM entity_id eid WITH(NOLOCK) join Person p WITH(NOLOCK) ON p.person_uid = entity_uid

labels.label: Remove [ and ] from the list if present
Convert the nested fields returned by the DB to actual nested JSON fields
Send a SQL request to fetch all the necessary data to insert into Elasticsearch

entry.value: Failed to insert person record with id: ${_id}

SELECT p.person_uid, p.add_time, p.add_user_id, p.as_of_date_admin, p.as_of_date_ethnicity, p.as_of_date_general, p.as_of_date_morbidity, p.as_of_date_sex, p.birth_time, p.birth_time_calc, p.cd, p.curr_sex_cd, p.deceased_ind_cd, p.electronic_ind, p.ethnic_group_ind, p.last_chg_time, p.last_chg_user_id, p.marital_status_cd, p.record_status_cd, p.record_status_time, p.status_cd, p.status_time, p.local_id, p.version_ctrl_nbr, p.edx_ind, p.dedup_match_ind, p.first_nm, p.middle_nm, p.last_nm, p.person_uid id, nested.address, nested.phone, nested.email, nested.name, nested.race, nested.entity_id FROM person p WITH (NOLOCK) OUTER apply ( SELECT * FROM -- address ( SELECT ( SELECT STRING_ESCAPE(pl.street_addr1, 'json') streetAddr1, STRING_ESCAPE(pl.street_addr2, 'json') streetAddr2, STRING_ESCAPE(pl.city_desc_txt, 'json') city, pl.zip_cd zip, pl.cnty_cd cntyCd, pl.state_cd state, pl.cntry_cd cntryCd FROM Entity_locator_participation elp WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN Postal_locator pl WITH (NOLOCK) ON elp.locator_uid = pl.postal_locator_uid WHERE elp.entity_uid = p.person_uid AND elp.class_cd = 'PST' AND elp.status_cd = 'A' FOR json path, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) AS address ) AS address, -- person phone ( SELECT ( SELECT tl.phone_nbr_txt telephoneNbr, tl.extension_txt extensionTxt FROM Entity_locator_participation elp WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN Tele_locator tl WITH (NOLOCK) ON elp.locator_uid = tl.tele_locator_uid WHERE elp.entity_uid = p.person_uid AND elp.class_cd = 'TELE' AND elp.status_cd = 'A' AND tl.phone_nbr_txt IS NOT NULL FOR json path, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) AS phone ) AS phone, -- person email ( SELECT ( SELECT STRING_ESCAPE(tl.email_address, 'json') emailAddress FROM Entity_locator_participation elp WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN Tele_locator tl WITH (NOLOCK) ON elp.locator_uid = tl.tele_locator_uid WHERE elp.entity_uid = p.person_uid AND elp.class_cd = 'TELE' AND elp.status_cd = 'A' AND tl.email_address IS NOT NULL FOR json path, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) AS email ) AS email, -- person_names ( SELECT ( SELECT STRING_ESCAPE(pn.last_nm, 'json') lastNm, pn.last_nm_sndx lastNmSndx, STRING_ESCAPE(pn.middle_nm, 'json') middleNm, STRING_ESCAPE(pn.first_nm, 'json') firstNm, pn.first_nm_sndx firstNmSndx, pn.nm_use_cd, pn.nm_suffix nmSuffix, pn.nm_degree nmDegree FROM person_name pn WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE person_uid = p.person_uid FOR json path, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) AS name ) AS name, -- person races ( SELECT ( SELECT pr.race_cd raceCd, pr.race_desc_txt raceDescTxt, pr.race_category_cd raceCategoryCd FROM Person_race pr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE person_uid = p.person_uid FOR json path, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) AS race ) AS race, -- Entity id ( SELECT ( SELECT ei.type_cd typeCd, ei.record_status_cd recordStatusCd, STRING_ESCAPE(ei.root_extension_txt, 'json') rootExtensionTxt FROM entity_id ei WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ei.entity_uid = p.person_uid FOR json path, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) AS entity_id ) AS entity_id ) AS nested WHERE p.person_uid in(${person_ids}) AND p.person_uid = p.person_parent_uid;
